definitions.definition: The source of water for a stream , spring or well ; a fountainhead ; a wellhead .
A perennial source of anything; a fountainhead of supply or emanation ; resource .

main_definition: The source of water for a stream , spring or well ; a fountainhead ; a wellhead .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) A perennial source of anything; a fountainhead of supply or emanation ; resource .
